# Code Examples

This file contains code blocks for testing context extraction.

## JavaScript Example

Here is some code:

```javascript
function hello() {
  console.log("Hello World");
  const searchTerm = "important keyword";
  return searchTerm;
}
```

After the code block.

## Python Example

Another code block:

```python
def search_function():
    query = "important keyword"
    results = find_matches(query)
    return results
```

End of python section.

## Inline Code

You can also use `inline code` like this.

The word keyword appears outside code blocks too.

## Unclosed Code Block Test

This section has an unclosed code block:

```bash
echo "This code block is never closed
keyword appears here
and continues
